# Problem 11.36 - Statically Indeterminate Problems {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A beam of length L<sub>1</sub> = 3 ft and L<sub>2</sub> = 6 ft is subjected to a distributed load w = 250 kip/ft as shown. Determine the reaction force at support B. Assume EI = 20,000 kip-ft<sup>2</sup>.

![Figure 1: A beam with three supports is subjected to the loading as shown.](images/436.png){fig-alt="A simply supported beam of length L1+L2 is subjected to a distributed load w. The distributed load occurs over L2."}
